title: 335 72 "Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Brave Pirates!"Transliteration: "Shinsekai de Matsu! Isamashiki Kaizoku to no Wakare" (Japanese:新世界で待つ! 勇ましき海賊との別れ) Hiroaki Miyamoto Koga Naoki December 16, 2007(2007-12-16)[7] February 28, 2016
transformers_text: 335 72 Waiting in the New World Farewell to the Brave Pirates Transliteration Shins eka i de Matsu Is ama shiki Kai z oku to no Waka re Japanese Hiroaki Miyamoto Koga Naoki December 16 2007 2007 12 16 7 February 28 2016 After a grueling struggle Luffy finally defeats Don Ac cino with a red hot Bazooka With a little help from Lil the two stolen flags are finally recovered and the crew manages to get it back on the ship before Luffy returns The defeated Ac cino Family sail away with the Don in tow and finally have a belated birthday celebration while Al belle makes up with her sister The Phoenix Pirates go to battle with Can pac cino and the remaining grunts Puzzle promising to meet the Straw Hats again in the New World
